issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We have a working amq 5.9.1 with an oracle data store 
when trying to upgrade to amq 5.12.1 we get the following error on startup 
Is there a way I can fix this 

Error:

fields.summary: Amq 5.12.1 Failing to start with Oracle Data Store

comments.body:
This probably related to AMQ-5958.  Commons Pool2 is now used.  Try switching org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource to org.apache.commons.dbcp2.BasicDataSource

The documentation on the website needs to be updated to reflect this change.

That seems to be the fix 
I will test further 
thanks
